casebody.data:
Hembree, Appellee, v. Mendenhall, Exr., Appellant, et al.

[Cite as Hembree v. Mendenhall, 116 Ohio St.3d 402, 2008-Ohio-l.]

*403(No. 2007-0516 Submitted November 28, 2007 Decided January 3, 2008.) John W. Herr, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Vitantonio, Inc. v. Baxter, 116 Ohio St.3d 195, 2007-Ohio-6052, 877 N.E.2d 663.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, O’Connor, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur. Lundberg Stratton and O’Donnell, JJ., dissent for the reasons stated in the dissenting opinion of O’Donnell, J., in Vitantonio, Inc. v. Baxter.
